6) Payments: WeChat, AliPay & UnionPay all prominent & accepted but for offline transactions witnessed, almost 90% were using WeChat. $V & $MA are D.O.A. there (UnionPay has credit card monopoly basically but everyone uses mobile wallets anyways, hard to see habit changing)

4) Apple $AAPL stores in prime locations busy (i.e. Shanghai Nanjing Rd) & people looking at entire product line. Stores further from core not busy at all & ppl only looking at iphones. Oppo also large store presence but not the busiest either.
